headline: Stock Market Indexes In Range But Leaders Flash Buy Signals Amid Trump Trade Deal: Weekly Review
summary: The major indexes are still rangebound, but picked up on a Trump trade deal with the U.K. Many leaders flashed buy signals.

headline: AppLovin's Rapid Ad Growth, AI Gains Drive Hike In Analyst Price Forecast
summary: Applovin Corp (NASDAQ:APP) stock closed higher by 12% on Thursday after the company reported better-than-expected first-quarter financial results on Wednesday. AppLovin reported quarterly sales of $1.48 billion, beating the consensus estimate of $1.38 billion and representing a 40% year-over-year increase. The company reported adjusted earnings per share of $1.67, beating the consensus estimate of $1.45. The company guided second-quarter advertising revenue of $1.19 billion-$1.21 billion. Also R
